actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 105-215.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 413.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and to further define the criteria for capital repair and operation and maintenance.
short_title: John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts Authorization Act
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts Authorization Act - Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to revise the criteria for certain duties with respect to capital repair and to operation and maintenance. Repeals a requirement that the Comptroller General review and audit the Center's accounts at least once every three years. Extends through FY 2003 the authorization of appropriations for the Center's: (1) maintenance, security, and repair; and (2) capital projects.

titles.title: John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts Authorization Act
John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts Authorization Act

A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and to further define the criteria for capital repair and operation and maintenance.
